name: The Trials of Winter
description:
The Trials of Winter

Assume the role of Antarcticite, a brave gem tasked with winter duties. As during any hibernation, he will make sure that nothing disturbs the sleep of others, nor the shrieking ice floes, nor the gems themselves, sleepwalking in the school.

Credits:

Overcast - Designer, Programmer, Producer. https://twitter.com/OvercastZombie

Yuzariy - Art, Writing. @voxelj

LaKuroNekoBaka - Background Art. https://twitter.com/LaKuroNekoBaka

DJ - Artist and Sound Designer. https://www.instagram.com/dj_cool_cicada

Gemerald - Sound Designer

Music - Land of the Lustrous OST, composed by Yoshiaki Fujisawa.
